Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial project setup with core systems and MVP features

Phase 1 implementation includes:
- Godot 4 project configuration with input mappings and autoloads
- Core singletons: GameManager, NetworkManager, AudioManager
- Player movement system with multiplayer authority support
- Base puzzle system with sliding tile puzzle implementation
- UI: Main menu, multiplayer lobby, and in-game HUD
- Comprehensive Game Design Document

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add dungeon generation, room navigation, and pattern puzzle

Phase 2 implementation:
- Procedural dungeon generator with seed-based layouts
- Room system with puzzle/treasure/shop/transit/arena types
- Room navigation with door transitions and progress tracking
- Pattern sequence puzzle \(Simon-says style\)
- Main Game scene connecting player, dungeon, and HUD
- Updated Lobby to load actual game scene

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
